overview: Farmer screenwriter Sun Laifu came to Shenzhen alone with his dream of being a screenwriter to join his cousin Shunzi, an extravagant actor. Next, Laifu temporarily lived with Shunzi, selling the script and seeing the world with Shunzi's run-and-run crew. But in the days that followed, Laifu staged a series of ridiculous events...
title: Laifu Into the City
